attributes.action: Rescind the knighthood awarded to Tony Blair
attributes.additional_details: History has shown that Tony Blair is not a fit and proper person to carry the honour of Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter.
attributes.background: The appointment of Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter awarded to Tony Blair should be rescinded.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
